Just a heads up mate, don\'t make spoiler tunnels without a purpose.

I loved the movie; the visuals were stunning and seeing all those heroes fighting together was great. I loved the funny moments of chemistry too like with Banner and Thor.

Wasn\'t great. I enjoyed the movie in a go to the movies and see a movie way, but it didn\'t inspire me or draw me in. Quite good dialogue, but the movie was quite cleche in its storyline (bad guy thretens earth, bad guy gets captured, bad guy escapes, bad guy tries to take over the earth and is stopped by the heroes).

> it was just them eating at that restaurant tony stark wanted to go to.

excuse me? it was those evil guys in space talking not just them eating at that restaurant tony stark wanted to go to.

ALSO: the nuke part was actually fake, because in order for nukes to be effective, they need to explode in the atmosphere.

(learned from sci-fi science)
One does not simply reason with the HULK
